types:type.name: account
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type account = {| name: String, billingAddress: String, billingCity: String, bilingState: String, bilingPostalCode: String, billingCountry: String |} {"example": "{\\\"name\\\":\\\"Teshe\\\",\\\"billingAddress\\\":\\\"123 centeral ave\\\",\\\"billingCity\\\":\\\"Charlotte\\\",\\\"bilingState\\\":\\\"NC\\\",\\\"bilingPostalCode\\\":\\\"12345\\\",\\\"billingCountry\\\":\\\"USA\\\"}"}
